Use natural light, no flash, and a simple background. Show the item being held, worn, or used.
For peak discoverability, choose from the suggested options. Buyers aren’t able to filter their results based on custom options.
For peak discoverability, choose from the suggested variations. Buyers aren’t able to filter their results based on custom variations.

Anything else? Custom order, wholesale or consignment info? FAQs?

US buyers are presented with a suggested address from the USPS® when they edit or add an address on Etsy. In this case, the buyer found that the USPS® suggested address was inaccurate or missing pertinent information and selected the address as it was originally entered before checking out.

US buyers are presented with a suggested address from the USPS® when they edit or add an address on Etsy. In this case, the USPS® was unable to find a close match for what the buyer entered as his or her address during checkout.
added a photo of their purchase
I offer this as a variation
Make it easier for buyers to find this by adding more details.
These values are suggested for you
You can now edit the craft type attribute in Sell on Etsy. Please continue using your web browser to edit non-craft type attributes.
Attributes help buyers find your item. For now, use your web browser to edit attributes.
Attributes help buyers find your item. Some attributes can only be edited from your web browser.
Based on your listing\'s data, we\'ve started filling out some of your item\'s attributes:
You were signed out of Etsy. You can sign in again through the Sign In button in the Navigation Drawer.
To save you time, new listings now default to renew automatically. You can change the renewal option for this listing below.
The buyer prefers this address over the USPS® suggested one.
USPS® could not confirm this address.

Please include steps to reproduce the bug and any other helpful information.
We really need a screenshot that shows the problem you\'ve found to properly zap your bug.

This will cost a non-refundable fee. By clicking \"Activate & Renew\" you agree to pay this fee. The listed on date for each listing will reset to today, and the expiration date will be four months from today.
For listings that expired while inactive, you have to renew before you can reactivate.

Once deactivated, this listing will not appear in your public shop. Deactivating a listing doesn’t affect its four month listing period. If your listing expires while inactive, you will be asked to renew the listing for a $0.20 fee before you can reactivate it. There is no fee for reactivating a listing that hasn’t expired.

Keep in mind that deleted listings can’t be retrieved. If you’d like to keep a listing from being viewed publicly without deleting it permanently, please deactivate the listing instead. This will allow you to edit or reactivate it at any time.
Please select at least one listing.

This will cost a non-refundable fee. By clicking \"Publish\" you agree to pay this fee. The listed on date for each listing will reset to today, and the expiration date will be four months from today.
By clicking “Renew” you agree to pay the nonrefundable listing fee below, and the new expiration date will be four months from today.

The estimated delivery date is based on your purchase date, the recipient\'s location, the seller’s processing time and location, and the shipping carrier. Other factors – like placing an order on a weekend or a holiday – may end up pushing the arrival of your item beyond the estimated delivery date. It\'s our hope that your item gets where it\'s going as soon as possible, but given the factors involved, this is only an estimate.

Access to the microphone was permanently denied. Go to the Android settings and enable the microphone permission to use the card reader.
To help protect buyers and sellers from fraudulent activity, Etsy needs to know where transactions take place. Please enable wireless networks and GPS from your settings and return to Sell on Etsy.

Card not charged. The internet is not available.

Your device does not support location-based services, a requirement for processing payments with Sell on Etsy. We use location to help protect buyers and sellers from fraudulent activity. You can still manage your Etsy shop with the app, but you’ll need a different device to sell in person with it.

We have removed the \'Private Receipt Info\' section of your policies page. You don\'t need to populate this section for the purposes of complying with international consumer protection laws anymore because this new Policies feature will automatically display the relevant content of your shop policies within the buyer receipt email instead.
Select a production partner or add a new one.
A production partner is anyone who\'s not a part of your Etsy shop who helps you physically produce your items.
I design everything, but get technical help (e.g. CAD, pattern making, etc.)
I collaborate with my shop members to design my products
I collaborate with independent designers to realise my ideas
I collaborate with my production partner to design my products
I contract with independent designers and have rights to their work
They make a component of my product, and I do the rest
They create a finished product that I alter / customise in house
They create a finished product, then I add branding and packaging
They create a finished product and ship it to my customer
I don’t have the technical ability or equipment to make it entirely by myself
I have outgrown my current production space
I need help meeting demand for this product
Other reason for working with partner

If an order includes multiple items, this is the shipping cost for each item after the first.

Processing time is the estimated time between an item\'s purchased date and when it will be shipped. If the item is made-to-order, include the time required to make it. Processing times can be changed at any time for current listings. Note that if an order is running late, you can edit the processing time once, and the buyer will be notified.
Shipping profiles allow you to re-use the same shipping settings for multiple listings. Once linked to a listing, updating a shipping profile will also update shipping on your listings.

But please contact me if you have any problems with your order.
The number of days a buyer has to ship an item back must be greater than the number of days a buyer has to contact you
EU buyer protection laws allow European residents to return items by contacting the seller within 14 days. We recommend you accept returns. Learn more.
Even if you don\'t accept returns or exchanges, buyers can still file cases in certain circumstances. Learn more about cases.

Buyers are responsible for return shipping costs. If the item is not returned in its original condition, the buyer is responsible for any loss in value.

Buyers outside of your country may need to pay customs or duties fees, which vary from country to country.\10\10Also, customs can sometimes delay delivery by many days. We want buyers to know that any customs delays are not your fault.
Buyers are responsible for any customs and import taxes that may apply. I\'m not responsible for delays due to customs.

Your listing title gives shoppers immediate descriptive information about your item. In addition, item titles, along with categories and tags, are used to populate listings in Browse, Categories, and Search. In other words, when someone searches on Etsy, the system looks at listing titles for a match.
